author: Thomas Edison
message: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
title: Thought of the day

author: Yogi Berra
message: You can observe a lot just by watching.
title: Thought of the day

author: Abraham Lincoln
message: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
title: Thought of the day

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
message: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
title: Thought of the day
